subtitles.text: Now it's time for Ebichu's Cousin Akita's corner!
In this corner, we will introduce you to the Shiritsu Ebisu Chugaku who have been appointed as PR ambassadors of Akita Prefecture
Akita Binokuni Girls, the PR ambassadors of Akita Prefecture.
We will learn about the charms of Akita and introduce them to you!
The members of Ebichu visited Akita and had various experiences related to Akita.
Akita, and have various experiences related to Akita.

First of all, please introduce yourself.

nice to meet you again. This is the second time we've met.

last time we filmed in March, what was your impression of Akita?

Was there anything memorable when you were filming? Yes, this was my first mv in 12 years, so it was a lot of fun, but there was a dance scene at the end that we had to shoot with extras, and we recruited extras from the family.

There have been fishermen in the creek for a long time.
They put their fish and seaweed in a wooden bucket filled with water.
Then they'd heat the pebbles over a charcoal fire until they were red hot and throw them in.
And they would cook it all at once and eat it for lunch.
That's how it is said to have happened.
